C

calculateGregorianDate(double) - Static method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.util.TimeUtil
Convert the given Julian Day to Gregorian Date (in UT time zone).
calculateJulianDay(Date) - Static method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.util.TimeUtil
Calculate the Julian Day for a given date using the following formula: JD = 367 * Y - INT(7 * (Y + INT((M + 9)/12))/4) + INT(275 * M / 9) + D + 1721013.5 + UT/24 Note that this is only valid for the year range 1900 - 2099.
calculateRADecOfZenith(Date, LatLong) - Static method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.util.Geometry
Compute celestial coordinates of zenith from utc, lat long.
calculateRotationMatrix(float, Vector3) - Static method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.util.Geometry
Calculate the rotation matrix for a certain number of degrees about the give axis.
calendarFromLong(Long) - Static method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.model.CelestialBodiesDB.Converters
Converts a Long value containing the number of milliseconds since the start of the Unix epoch (1970-01-01 00:00:00.000 UTC) to an instance of Calendar, and returns the latter.
CaptureFragment - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.controller
A simple Fragment subclass.
CaptureFragment() - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.controller.CaptureFragment
 
CelestialApplication - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies
Extends Application, in order to initialize Stetho inspection and set up access to this instance via the singleton pattern.
CelestialApplication() - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.CelestialApplication
 
CelestialBodiesDB - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.model
Defines the local database as a collection of its entities and converters, with the singleton pattern implemented for app-wide use of a single connection, and declares methods to retrieve data access objects (DAOs) for the database entities.
CelestialBodiesDB() - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.model.CelestialBodiesDB
 
CelestialBodiesDB.Converters - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.model
Supports conversion operations for persistence of relevant types not natively supported by Room/SQLite.
Clock - Interface in edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.controller
Provides a time reading.
clockTimeFromHrs(double) - Static method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.util.TimeUtil
Take a universal time between 0 and 24 and return a triple [hours, minutes, seconds].
clone() - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.units.Matrix33
